Enum NetworkIF.IfOperStatus

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<NetworkIF.IfOperStatus>
oshi.hardware.NetworkIF.IfOperStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NetworkIF.IfOperStatus>
Enclosing interface:
NetworkIF
public static enum NetworkIF.IfOperStatus extends Enum<NetworkIF.IfOperStatus>
The current operational state of a network interface.

As described in RFC 2863.

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    DORMANT
    The interface is not up, but is in a pending state, waiting for some external event.
    DOWN
    Down and not operational.
    LOWER_LAYER_DOWN
    Down due to state of lower-layer interface(s).
    NOT_PRESENT
    Some component is missing
    TESTING
    In some test mode.
    UNKNOWN
    The interface status is unknown.
    UP
    Up and operational.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • UP

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus UP
      Up and operational. Ready to pass packets.

    • DOWN

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus DOWN
      Down and not operational. Not ready to pass packets.

    • TESTING

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus TESTING
      In some test mode.

    • UNKNOWN

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus UNKNOWN
      The interface status is unknown.

    • DORMANT

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus DORMANT
      The interface is not up, but is in a pending state, waiting for some external event.

    • NOT_PRESENT

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus NOT_PRESENT
      Some component is missing

    • LOWER_LAYER_DOWN

      public static final NetworkIF.IfOperStatus LOWER_LAYER_DOWN
      Down due to state of lower-layer interface(s).
